We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AccumulationDistribution _ad;
// In Initialize()
_ad = AD(symbol,);

// In OnData()
if (_ad.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "AD Is Ready", _ad.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "AD Warm Up Period", _ad.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "AD Current", _ad.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "AD Name", _ad.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "AD Samples", _ad.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.ad = self.AD(symbol,)

# In OnData()
if self.ad.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AD Is Ready", self.ad.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AD Warm Up Period", self.ad.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AD Current", self.ad.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AD Name", self.ad.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "AD Samples", self.ad.Samples);
}
